channel.title: [718] Quick Question need some feedback thank you :) [718]
channel.description:
Hi guys,
How do I make a dialogue spawn an NPC on a 718 (using Rune-Evo V3 source)?
Same goes with an object, how would I make an object spawn an NPC (as in, clicking on an altar and a greater demon spawning).
Will thank you so much for this :)
